body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Permelia Jane Welsh Radley. Father of Louisiana Radley Starling, Sallie Radley, John Radley, and Mary H. Radley. Constable in Hardin County in 1847. Sheriff of Hardin County from 1858 to 1863.
